Size:

Source:

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15:8] N_PASSIVE_CYCLES rw 0x0 -
[7:0] N_ACTIVE_CYCLES rw 0x1 -

Field Descriptions

N_PASSIVE_CYCLES

Number of ADC clock cycles during which target will be inactive.

N_ACTIVE_CYCLES

Number of ADC clock cycles during which target will be active.
